page.title: 05INDUSTRY ON ALSTON MOOR (1)
page.content: {KEARTON CONSTRUCTION Keartons started up in Alston in 1878; the business covers{general {building,}civil engineering and building restoration. They employ people from Alston Moor but when they work elsewhere they employ subcontractors to do their work. Keartons don't find much work in Alston although 95% is done within a 50 mile radius of Alston,and can be affected by inclement weather. {MOUNTAIN RANGE Mountain Range started in 1983;the {garments}they make are the outer shell of a fell walker,which goes over the rest of his/her clothes to keep him/her dry. Mountain Range have started working in a new material called GOR_TEX.Their main buyers are shops in the Lake District.The workshop has just been extended.
